I‚Äôm seen this mentioned before, but having played thousands of games without ever hitting the jackpot I‚Äôve begun to suspect this game is rigged. Rewards are few and the game will lock on occasion and instead of reverting back to let you try again it simply re-starts and you‚Äôre minus whatever jewel and coins spent.  This has happened numerous times now and as there‚Äôs no easy way to report you‚Äôre pretty much screwed out of whatever you‚Äôve managed to build up.  As the game requires numerous plays to start seeing rewards it‚Äôs gotten to the point where frustration has replaced enjoyment and I play less.  Also the ads are super repetitive and pointless.  Happy hours always cost money, the coins you build up are not good for much other than special gems which are expensive for the rewards.  Paying for additional time is often not worth doing either as it won‚Äôt help your score much.   Bummer, this used to be fun.

After 20 years of playing and supporting the Bejeweled Blitz game, I have, in my opinion, found the game to be controlled by a unfair and predetermined system that makes it impossible to play the game fairly with those who play the game. I have noticed that the game will slow down so a higher score can not be obtained by a person at certain levels and times. I tested this out by playing one game over 40 times without reaching over a certain low point level, when playing against a person who had a little higher score. Also, even if you choose the right bonus star for the 500,000 points, the computer will switch over to a different point award. Until the game starts to allow fairness and not a game that is now dissatisfying and disappointing to play, I won‚Äôt support it monetarily anymore.

I love Bejeweled Blitz and have played for many years. On my desktop, I have Party Mode where a friend and I play together; our combined score shared. I can‚Äôt see that on my iPad or iPhone. Recently I had an occasion to be physically with a friend who said his android tablet has that option. Obviously tablets or touchscreens are at a scoring advantage over the use of a mouse. Any hope of an Apple version that matches? 
IOS also missing 3 levels of Keystone challenges.

title.label: Fun but remember it‚Äôs an app not a game

content.label: I‚Äôve been playing this game for years (because it‚Äôs fun) but I‚Äôve never got the grand prize. Not that it matters, but it‚Äôs totally rigged. This game pretty much decides when you win as well. There will be times when you just can‚Äôt score above a certain score no matter how good you are. It also gives you crap game boards sometimes when you actually use boosts so keep that in mind. It‚Äôs a risk. The best way to enjoy this app honestly is to have you and your friends not use any of the major boosts when playing each other. Also. As soon as I started being good, and built up enough coin  so that the game wasn‚Äôt controlling me, I got disconnected from my friends. It was almost as if they knew they weren‚Äôt going to be able to make money off me because I had a lot of coins and just exiled me. Now I play all by myself.  :(
If you like watching ads this is the game for you!!! I have been playing this game for years, but now have finally had enough with the constant ads. Ads ads ads!!! Time to find a game to play.
